name: TalkBoey
commands: You there, I've got you now!
Gah! Girl, stop!|I'm innocent, those haters wouldn't know that of course.|It's all just 'cause I'm beautiful!
See, I know you'd be hilarious!
Huh? Hilarious... {c:expression;Boey;Smile}Yeah!|Like, of course I am!|Obviously your Highness would have good taste!
Now, what actually got you put away?
Like if I know!|That stuffy knight was all up in my shit!|Apparently, it's "illegal", to ask for money!
Money? Man, the knights are too cruel to the commoners...
Commoner? Ha? I'm better than your average commoner!
Uh, yeah?|I'm a gang leade-, I mean, mercenary!
Where's the rest of your crew?
They ran away when the knights arrived!|Lousy traitors...
Seems like you could use some work.
For a prince?|That isn't my usual line of work...|But anything beats prison, sure.
I'll make sure to pardon you!|But, you're not running away., right?
You dissin' me?|I'm a man of my word, well, if you sweeten the deal, mhm?
If you mean money, you might be conpensated eventually... Wait, what is your name?
Boey's the name of the fabulous merc you see before you.|Don't worry, you'll remember it!
source:
music;Strange People
multi_add_portrait;Boey;Right;Sages;Left
speak;Sages;You there, I've got you now!
speak;Boey;Gah! Girl, stop!|I'm innocent, those haters wouldn't know that of course.|It's all just 'cause I'm beautiful!
speak;Sages;See, I know you'd be hilarious!
speak;Boey;Huh? Hilarious... {c:expression;Boey;Smile}Yeah!|Like, of course I am!|Obviously your Highness would have good taste!
speak;Sages;Now, what actually got you put away?
expression;Boey;NoSmile
speak;Boey;Like if I know!|That stuffy knight was all up in my shit!|Apparently, it's "illegal", to ask for money!
speak;Sages;Money? Man, the knights are too cruel to the commoners...
speak;Boey;Commoner? Ha? I'm better than your average commoner!
speak;Sages;I see, you're strong then?
speak;Boey;Uh, yeah?|I'm a gang leade-, I mean, mercenary!
speak;Sages;Where's the rest of your crew?
speak;Boey;They ran away when the knights arrived!|Lousy traitors...
speak;Sages;Seems like you could use some work.
speak;Boey;Uh, yeah, I guess...
speak;Sages;Come join us!
speak;Boey;For a prince?|That isn't my usual line of work...|But anything beats prison, sure.
speak;Sages;I'll make sure to pardon you!|But, you're not running away., right?
speak;Boey;You dissin' me?|I'm a man of my word, well, if you sweeten the deal, mhm?
speak;Sages;If you mean money, you might be conpensated eventually... Wait, what is your name?
speak;Boey;Boey's the name of the fabulous merc you see before you.|Don't worry, you'll remember it!
speak;Sages;Welcome aboard, Boey!
change_team;Boey;player
change_roam_ai;Boey;NoneRoam
multi_remove_portrait;Boey;Sages
remove_talk;Sages;Boey
music_fade_back
